PHRASE.LANG: You'll always be seen in good company with this boyfriend companion! He will never let you down: he follows you everywhere, kneels down in admiration before you, applaudes you, and runs after you. Always by your side, he loves you so much that when he looks at you, little hearts fly up above his head! [#Legal]

Vous serez toujours en bonne compagnie avec ce petit ami! Il ne vous abandonnera jamais: il vous suit partout, s'agenouille devant vous, vous applaudit, et vous court après. Toujours à vos côtés, il vous aime tant que lorsqu'il vous regarde, des petits coeurs s'envolent de sa tête! [#Legal]

Du wirst immer in guter Gesellschaft mit diesem Freund Begleiter werden! Er wird nie im Stich lassen: starrt dich liebevoll, und läuft nach dir. Immer an Ihrer Seite, er liebt dich so sehr, dass, wenn er dich anschaut, kleinen Herzen fliegen über den Kopf![#Legal]
Sarai sempre in buona compagnia con il fidanzato! Egli non vi abbandonerà. [#Legal]
Siempre estarás en buena compañía con el novio! Él nunca te abandonará: te sigue a todas partes, y te mira con admiración. [#Legal]

You'll always be seen in good company with this boyfriend companion! He will never let you down: he follows you everywhere, kneels down in admiration before you, applaudes you, and runs after you. Always by your side, he loves you so much that when he looks at you, little hearts fly up above his head! [#Legal]

You'll always be seen in good company with this boyfriend companion! He will never let you down: he follows you everywhere, kneels down in admiration before you, applaudes you, and runs after you. Always by your side, he loves you so much that when he looks at you, little hearts fly up above his head! [#Legal]
